portfolio.title: Meme Generator
portfolio.description: A meme generator that feteches a random meme image from an API and and allows you to add text to the top and bottom of the image.

portfolio.title: Tenzies
portfolio.description: A simple game of tenzies, the goal is to make all the dice the same value and upon winning the page rains confetti and the user can start a new game.

portfolio.title: HCCS Electrical
portfolio.description: An electrician website I made for a client. It's made to be highly expandable and grow with their business. Includes both desktop and mobile versions.

portfolio.title: Capybara
portfolio.description: A social sports platform for people to meetup and play. Built from the ground up using React Native and firebase as a backend to host the data.
